bibl.title: Death on the Nile. Disease and the Demography of Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. Mortality patterns and causes of death. - 2. Age structure and life expectancy. - 3. Population size and demographic change. - Appendices. Bibliography. Index.
bibl.seg: SCHEIDEL Walter, Death on the Nile. Disease and the Demography of Roman Egypt. (Mnemosyne. Supplementum 228.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 2001, 8°, xxx-286 pp., tabl., graphiques, 2 cartes. ISBN 90-04-12323-7. €78.
Introduction. - 1. Mortality patterns and causes of death. - 2. Age structure and life expectancy. - 3. Population size and demographic change. - Appendices. Bibliography. Index.

C.R. par Arnaldo Marcone, Athenaeum 91 (2003) pp. 701-702. - Jean A. Straus, ChrEg 78 (2003) Nos 155-156, pp. 352-354. - Arjan Zuiderhoeck, Mnemosyne 4a s., 56 (2003) pp. 246-250. - Colin Adams, CR N.S., 54 (2004) pp. 512-514.
